projects.title: Element Ritual
projects.subtitle: Game experiences
projects.description: I took part in a group of six people of all game development-related fields to create a game within 48 hours. The video game we created is a FPS where the player has to travel through two temples filled with enemy to perform a ritual (this Game Jam theme).
